title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic Data Fabric: Powering Autonomous AI with Trusted Data (AIM257)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理数据结构：以可信数据驱动自主AI (AIM257)
abstract: Agentic AI demands more than good models—it needs great data. In this session, learn how Reltio’s agentic data fabric, powered by Amazon Bedrock, delivers real-time, trusted data to autonomous agents. See how Reltio AgentFlow™ and the Match Resolver agent, developed in collaboration with AWS GenAI Innovation Center, drive real-world results, reducing manual costs by up to 70%. You’ll leave with a clear view of what makes data “agentic” and how to start deploying agents that act—not just suggest. This presentation is brought to you by Reltio, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 智能代理AI需要的不仅仅是优秀的模型——它需要出色的数据。在本次会议中，了解Reltio基于Amazon Bedrock的智能代理数据架构如何为自主代理提供实时、可信的数据。了解Reltio AgentFlow™和与AWS GenAI创新中心合作开发的匹配解析代理如何推动实际成果，将人工成本降低高达70%。您将清楚了解什么使数据具有"智能代理"特性，以及如何开始部署能够执行行动而非仅提供建议的代理。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Reltio为您呈现。
